features: 【Upgraded Bookshelf】After doing research on all the bookshelf in the market, we carefully designed this outstanding quality book shelves , back X-shaped wire design, can effectively enhance the stability of the skinny bookshelf, so you no longer have to worry about the problem of shaking, the side horizontal tube has not only beautiful function, but also to prevent items from falling.

【Versatile Bookcase Shelf】The adjustable feet at the bottom are designed to make this industrial bookshelf suitable for different conditions of uneven floors.You can put it in your living room, study room, bedroom, and office to meet your various storage needs and greatly save your space and organizing time.This bookcase is compact and lightweight without occupy much space,you can use it at anywhere you need to better organize your messy items.

【Retro Design Bookcase】The simple yet vintage industrial style design makes this bookshelf a perfect fit for a variety of furniture styles.We choose high quality carbon steel and MDF board for this rustic bookshelf to ensure its stability and solidity so as for your long term uses.

【Quick Assemble】We totally understand that you may encounter some problems while assemble our etagere bookcase,so we carefully drill every hole and grind every screw,marked each component with letters,also comes with a detailed illustrated installation manual for your quick installation.

【What You Will Get】HOMEU aims to provide every customer with quality products and services,so please donot hesitate to contact us whenever and whatever issues you came across about our metal shelves,we will try our best to solve it for you within 24 Hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HOEMU 3 Tier Bookshelf Industrial Bookcase, S-Shaped Morden End Table Side Table Do you need a small bookshelf at home or office to organize your books or belongings? Set up a reading corner in your home or office with our small bookshelf. The stand is very sturdy and stable. The package is equipped with the tools corresponding to the assembly needs.
Assembly tip: There are not enough pilot holes in the side pieces, they must be drilled a little more before attaching them with the provided screws

Bedroom Whether used as a side table, nightstand, or bedside table, it provides convenient storage and display options for your essentials. Study Room This rustic side table will be complimented by anyone who visits your home. Your eye-catching new coffee table deserves your compliments with its one-of-a-kind design. living Room This farmhouse coffee table decoration will match a variety of decorating styles. Enjoy all our farmhouse furniture to match your entryway, living room, kitchen, bedroom

MDF Board MDF wood panel veneer not only adds an elegant touch, but is also easy to clean and maintain. S-Shape Made of solid stainless steel construction and engineered thickened particle board, it is stable and sturdy. Adjustable foot Adjustable tripod allows you to adjust according to the situation on unstable surfaces

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shelf was even nicer than I expected it to be. The boards are not real wood, but they are press board/MDF type material. They are much sturdier than the particle board that inexpensive furniture is often made of. The poles are some type of metal alloy and are relatively sturdy. Certainly sturdy enough for their purpose. It comes with a combo Allen wrench/Phillips screwdriver, but I recommend using a regular sized Phillips screw driver. Some of the screws were pretty tight to get in, and I think it would have been pretty hard to use the small tool that is included. Please forgive the mess, I just put some stuff on there to give some bit of size perspective.Measurements in the listing appear accurate. The only other thing potentially useful I can think of is that the space between the inside of the black pole and the other side of the shelf is just over 13.5 inches wide. In other words, the shelf itself is 15.7 inches wide overall, but you could only fit something about 13.5 inches wide on the shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something small but sturdy bookcase and found this and I actually loved it in my home office. It can be used as side table next to your bed or as I bookcase in your study or office space. This can be definitely used in dorm room or kids study as well. Very functional. It came with proper instructions and was easy to assemble. It is Black in the color which matches well with other furniture i.e. my computer table and office chair. It is not bulky or very heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Prepare for frustration
reviews.reviewText: As usual, this self-assemble furniture isn't an easy build. The instructions aren't clear, mostly because the important details are too tiny to see. The design uses some allen bolts but also a lot of wood screws, so be ready to put some extra effort into screwing those wood screws in, especially considering the nontraditional zigzagging boards.Picture 1: This was me just trying to do step 1. You can probably deduce more than what I was trying to convey here, but you can see how there's two holes next to each other on the board, but it's very small in the instructions.Picture 2: I was at step 3 here, trying to figure out how to attach board 3. Phone didn't capture it well I guess, but there's supposed to be two holes in each corner of this board. There's one missing. Checking the other side, they did drill a hole, but didn't go all the way through. It ended up being fine since the wood screw was able to get through the remaining part of the board.Picture 3: This is the worst of the cosmetic damage across the whole side table, so I guess I'm thankful that there weren't gouges or smashed in corners or anything like that.In the end, I got it together. I had to use my own screwdriver by the way, and you should too. Trying to screw in wood screws with their combo allen wrench-screwdriver doesn't have the grip or the torque to do the job very efficiently. Even with my real screwdriver my hand was shaking a little when I was done.The design for the legs makes it a bit tricky for the bottom legs. It's easy for the table to be built wobbly if you don't screw down the legs evenly. (There are screw-in feet but I didn't consider adjusting them since they're really lose as soon as you back them out.) After noticing a very slight wobble on a hard surface, I went back and adjusted the legs and now it's stable.So really, a decent design, but I'd like some more care during manufacturing to completely drill out holes, and some care throughout the whole process to prevent scratching damage like in my picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY nice, versatile shelf!
reviews.reviewText: We LOVE this! Even my picky husband really likes it.It was easy to put together...everything you need is provided. I had planned to use it as a computer storage area but then switched to using it as a printer stand. I LOVE IT. As a printer stand it's a little tall and it does a little shimmy as the printer is going, but it's not meant to be a printer stand so that's FINE with me. It LOOKS fabulous and is worth the shimmy.Everyone that has come into my office has asked me where I got it, & my daughter tried to take it. It's great.It's perfect for nice looking storage or just a modern decor display shelf.SO versatile. We will have this for a LONG time.10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its Hard To Get The Foot On
reviews.reviewText: I got the bookcase specifically for my vinyl player. I needed a stand that could hold the vinyl records and the player in one place. I love the height and the design of the bookcase. I wish I would have chosen the black one instead, but its still perfect for my vinyl. It was struggle getting one of the feet on, but I managed to get it on after a few tweaks. I'm happy with the bookcase overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great and is quite sturdy; instructions could use some work.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to add some additional "aesthetic organization" to my office, as my shelves were starting to look a little cluttered. I'm quite happy with both how it looks the quality of the build/materials! Also, I have a black Ikea Malm corner desk and this matched it perfectly color-wise.My only complaint is that the instructions were a little unclear. One side of the shelf panels have little milled out sections, seemingly for a bolt head to tighten flush, but this isn't indicated visually or textually anywhere in the instructions in regards to which direction it should be facing. It's not a big problem at all, as it still assembles easily from visual reference and the milled areas are covered regardless--just something to note.I definitely recommend this. It's nice and modern looking, assembles fairly quick and easily, and feels quite sturdy all put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Funky modern/industrial shelf
reviews.reviewText: This shelf definitely has a look that stands out. It’s solid and easy to assemble, it took about 20 minutes. I like the look of it and it will house my current book collection. I really like the dark rust brown color and it fits my style perfectly.
